short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button near every ChatGPT assistant message that will create a new Obsidian note with asistant's text inside.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin creates a button on ChatGPT website that will save the answer in a dedicated note that you can later open with Obsidian. ChatGPT markdown syntax is preserved 

Experimental features:
 - Select a part of assistant's message with your mouse and press "Save to Obsidian" button. If you find any bugs, report them in my GitHub repository
